Title: The Welsh Way - Inside the 'Harvard of coaching'
Description: BBC Sport goes behind the scenes at the coaching course which counts Thierry Henry and Mikel Arteta as graduates, and is shaping stars of the future.

Title: Rokid's Max 2 AR glasses bring a 215-inch screen anywhere — and they're magnificent
Description:
The Max 2 is a standout hit thanks to a lightweight design and extensive adjustability.
These AR glasses basically let you take a 215-inch Micro-OLED panel anywhere, and that in itself is a huge bonus.

Title: Ahead of this week's NATO summit, Europe is uncertain about its old ally, the U.S.
Description: This year's NATO summit opens Tuesday, attended by a disengaged United States, which seems bent on fighting its own battles, rather than helping European allies with the increased threat from Russia.

Title: The US bombed Iran. Now, the whole world is watching the Strait of Hormuz.
Description: All eyes are now on the Strait of Hormuz, a 90-mile strip critical to global oil prices.

Title: My Mother-In-Law Loves Buying Pink Princess Dresses For Our Daughter. There’s Just One Problem.
Description: She won't take a hint.

Title: Redrafting the top 10 picks in every MLB draft from 2015 to 2024
Description:

Title: Prime Day Arrives Early: Bluetti 1000W Power Station Hits an All-Time Low at Amazon

Title: EU rules for durable, energy-efficient and repairable smartphones and tablets
Description: Designed to boost the product lifespan, energy efficiency, and ease of repair, the measures will also help consumers make more informed and sustainable purchasing choices.

Title: Report: Apple to announce ‘some’ App Store changes in the EU to avoid additional DMA fines
Description:
In April, Apple was fined 500 million euros for violating the Digital Markets Act in the European Union.
Since that penalty was announced, however, the company hasn’t announced any further changes to its App Store Guidelines to avoid further fines.

Title: How H5N1 Went from an Illness in Wild Birds to a Global Pandemic Threat
Description:
The first hints that a new strain of avian illness is emerging could be found on this beach on Delaware Bay, where migrating birds flock.
Here’s what virus detectives who return there every year know right now.

Title: Denmark will stick with Windows — government still plans to ditch Microsoft Office
Description: Denmark's Ministry of Digital Affairs will switch from Microsoft Office to LibreOffice but does not plan to replace Windows with Linux.

Title: This triple-layer sunlight catalyst supercharges green hydrogen by 800%
Description:

Title: Stunning first images show the power of the Vera C. Rubin Observatory
Description: A powerful new telescope in Chile is set to transform astronomy, and its first pictures of stellar nurseries and galaxies have just been unveiled

Title: Modeling the World in 280 Characters
